column4: Is there something like a development branch for Ubuntu and if so, what is the apt-repository called?
Looking at http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/ there already seems to be hoary
it's empty
you can put them on hold
that's exactly what i want to do, but how?
I'm sure synaptic has an option somewhere...
After taken a closer look I saw it does, most intuitively it's called ``lock version''... Thanks
ubuntu has more modules, yeah
alright, thanks
on hoary?
yes
close, ipw2100
what works for thombot?
from umount?
